description: This file is a Python script that demonstrates how to use personalized memories and summaries in an agent, including setting up database connections, creating an agent, and interacting with it through print_response calls.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with a model and manages memories and storage.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles storage of memories in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the memory component of the agent, including database storage.

classes.name: LMStudio
classes.description: Represents the language model used by the agent.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method called on the agent to output responses based on input prompts.
